DOC.brief_summary: To address whether custom make foot insole could use primary prevention lower limb overuse injury , investigator conduct prospective , randomize control study comparing use insoles standard shoe healthy young adult expose increased physical activity .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : healthy conscript without diagnosed deformity low limb physician premilitary physical examination Exclusion criterion : major orthopaedic medical condition ( e.g. , diabetes , inflammatory arthritis , previous severe trauma ( exclusion criterion military service ) patient exclude study already insoles prescribed physician physiotherapist ( eight patient ) since 2 % Finnish conscript female , exclude study
